examples.example: 所有努力奋斗的人都值得我们尊敬和赞美。

translate.english: All those who strive hard deserve our respect and praise.

examples.example: 所有的困难都是暂时的，只要我们保持积极的心态就能克服它们。

translate.english: All difficulties are temporary, as long as we keep a positive attitude we can overcome them.

examples.example: 所有的梦想都有可能实现，只要我们坚持不懈地去追求。

translate.english: All dreams are possible to come true as long as we persevere in pursuing them.
